#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<cmath>
#include<queue>
#include<climits>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
struct in
{
    ll a,b;
};
typedef struct in in;
bool cmp(in aa,in bb)
{
    if(aa.b>bb.b)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
ll inn[1000005],out[1000005];
in deg[1000005];
int main()
{
    ll tc,n,m,i,a,b;
    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        memset(inn,0,sizeof(inn));
        memset(out,0,sizeof(out));
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            cin>>a>>b;
            inn[a]++;
            out[b]++;
        }
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            deg[i].a=i;
            deg[i].b=(i-1)+inn[i]-out[i];
        }
        sort(deg+1,deg+n+1,cmp);
       // for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
         //   cout<<deg[i].a<<" "<<deg[i].b<<endl;
        if(deg[1].b<n-1)
            cout<<"1"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"2 "<<deg[1].a<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
